mdRecord.dcterms:title: Barter Players 1985 Season poster
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Production poster for And A Nightingale Sang... by C. P. Taylor| Agnes of God by John Pielmeier| My Fat Friend by Charles Laurence| Painting Churches by Tina Howe| The Guardsman by Ferenc Molnar| Greater Tuna by Jaston Williams, Joe Sears, and Ed Howard| Twice around the Park by Murray Schisgal| Billy Bishop Goes to War by John Gray and Eric Peterson| Sea Marks by Gardner McKay| The Belle of Ahmrest by William Luce| Educating Rita by Willy Russel| The Merry Adventures of Robin Hood| Fairy Tales and Fables

Virginia

This digital surrogate is made publicly available by the Barter Theatre for use in research, teaching, private study, and other educational purposes.
